The dark void of terror fills your mind as, horribly, blood begins to seep out of every pore on your body.

A serpent spirit darts forward and sinks its fangs into your leg, pumping it full of venom.

^(\w+) casually flicks a Wheel of Misfortune tarot towards you and it stops short\, hovering in the air before you\. The image of the Wheel imprinted on the card begins to rapidly expand\, as it pulsates omniously\.$

^Missing only the center circle\, the Wheel of Misfortune looms over your surroundings as its expansion finishes\. With a maniacal grin\, (\w+) draws forth a stream of life essence from your body\, channeling it towards the massive Wheel\. As the essence converges upon the Wheel's center\, the construction is completed and it begins to slowly\, inexorably\, spin around its axle\.$

^A loud crack is heard as all the spokes in the Wheel of Misfortune is split in two\. The triangular pieces are swirled around the outer circle\, creating sharp points along the outer rim\. The Wheel picks up speed\, swaying erratically from side to side\, aiming at your exposed limbs\.$
^Rapidly spinning now\, the Wheel moves at a blur\, the pointed edges along the sides barely visible\. A wave of dark\, necromantic energy shoots out from the Wheel\, fixing itself upon you\.$

Trigger.name: cure affliction
Trigger.script:
local str = selectString(multimatches[1][1], 1) if isAnsiFgColor(0) then return end
local aff = multimatches[2][2]:gsub("-","_")
deleteLine()
local writhes = { "writhe_impaled", "writhe_transfix", "writhe_armpitlock", "writhe_web", "writhe_bind", "writhe_vines", "writhe_thighlock", "mob_impaled", "writhe_ropes", "grappled", }
for i, v in ipairs(writhes) do if aff == v then fs.off("writhe") break end end
for k, v in pairs(affs.lib.restoration) do if table.contains(affs.lib.restoration[k], aff) then affs.restoring = nil if timers.restoring then killTimer(timers.restoring) end break end end
if not affs.current[aff] then affs.rem("hidden", true) end
affs.rem(aff, true) fs.release()
for k, v in pairs(affs.lastcures) do local exceptions = { affs = { shell_fetish = true, stormtouched = true, void = true, weakvoid = true }, renew = true, tree = true }
if exceptions[v] then table.iremovekey(affs.lastcures, v) end
if type(v) == "string" and not exceptions[v] then if not exceptions.affs[aff] and affs.lib[v] and table.contains(affs.lib[v], aff) then for _, a in ipairs(affs.lib[v]) do if a == aff then break end affs.rem(a, true) end table.iremovekey(affs.lastcures, v) else table.iremovekey(affs.lastcures, v) end elseif type(v) == "table" and not exceptions[v] then local cure = v.name local tar = v.target if not exceptions.affs[aff] and affs.lib[v] and table.contains(affs.lib[cure][tar], aff) then for _, a in ipairs(affs.lib[cure][tar]) do if a == aff then break end affs.rem(a, true) end table.removekey(affs.lastcures, v.name) end end end

regexCodeList.string: You have cured
^You have cured (.+)\.$
Your senses return to you as the blackout ends.

You make a wild catch for the glowing tarot floating before you, managing to get a hold on it. Summoning all of your strength, you rip it down the middle, and the enormous Wheel hanging over you ceases moving. A moment later, the Wheel shatters into ethereal fragments, disappearing as they rain over you.

Trigger.name: salve
Trigger.script:
if o.stats.status ~= "living" then return end if o.bals.salve then return end
local cap = multimatches[2][2]
local salve = affs.lib.to_cure[cap] local tar = multimatches[2][3]:gsub(" ", "_")
stopwatch.salve = nil stopwatch.salve = createStopWatch() startStopWatch(stopwatch.salve)
if cap == "restoration" then timers.salve_used = 4.2
local aff = tmp.restoring
affs.restoring = affs.restoring or {} affs.restoring[aff] = true for _, aff in ipairs(affs.lib[aff].also) do affs.restoring[aff] = true end return end
if cap == "mending" then setTriggerStayOpen("salve", 1) tmp.mending_target = tar end
timers.salve_used = 1.1
if affs.lastcures[salve] then affs.lastcures[salve] = {} affs.lastcures[salve].name = salve affs.lastcures[salve].target = tar end

Trigger.name: cooldown capture
Trigger.script:
local cd = matches[2]:lower():gsub(" ", "_") local cap = tonumber(matches[6]) local cap2 = matches[7]
if cap2 == "minutes" then local time = tonumber(cap*60) fs.offcd(cd) fs.oncd(cd, time) elseif cap2 == "seconds" then local time = cap fs.offcd(cd) fs.oncd(cd, time) else cap = tonumber(cap*60) cap2 = tonumber(cap2) local time = tonumber(cap + cap2) fs.offcd(cd) fs.oncd(cd, time) end

^Your muscles bulge as you tear apart the earth\, the deafening rumble drowning out your yell of effort\. The mighty chasm quickly spreads through the cracks towards (\w+) and swallows (?:him|her) into its dark depths\. Screams of sheer terror accompany (:?his|her) rapid descent\, abruptly muffled by the rapid mending of the earth behind (?:him|her)\.$
The earth quickly mends itself together after you lose your concentration upon creating the chasm.
You kneel, and place your hands upon the earth beneath you. As if on command, the earth shifts and begins to travel up your arms.
The ground begins to heave and toss about, jolting your steadily growing frame violently.
You cease your focus upon attaining the earthen form, your mass returning to normal as the earth falls from your body.

It takes several painstaking moments for the mass to settle upon every part of your body. Compacted in the comforting embrace of the earth, you rise anew, towering over your surroundings in your monstrous earthen form.
sins, and it begins to crackle with fire.
^You raise your spiritual mace over (\w+) to pass judgement on (:?his|her) sins\, and it begins to crackle with fire\.$
You swing the crackling mace about your head, gathering momentum as you bear down on
^You swing the crackling mace about your head\, gathering momentum as you bear down on (?:him|her)\.$
The mace begins to make a high-pitched keening sound as it rapidly spins over your head.
With a roar of righteous fury, you bring your burning, shrieking mace down upon
^With a roar of righteous fury\, you bring your burning\, shrieking mace down upon (\w+)\, who crumples lifeless to the ground as (:?his|her) sins are purged by your cleansing fire\.$
You lower your mace and cease passing judgement.
^\w+ has fled your righteous grasp\.$
You cease your judgement.
You lower your spiritual mace, ending your judgement.
Summoning up all your mental strength and physical agility, you begin to vibrate your body as quickly as possible.
A short burst of azure light fills your vision and when it is gone, you find yourself phased out of sync with the rest of reality.
You cease to concentrate on phasing out of reality.
The presence of another prevents you from phasing.
You draw upon the residual energy that surrounds you in a halo of crackling power and prepare to create
^You draw upon the residual energy that surrounds you in a halo of crackling power and prepare to create (:?a|an) \w+ fortification\.$
Using energy from the focal point, you will it to disperse outward to fill the air with cloaking static, interfering with telepathic abilities.
Diverting energy from the focal point, you erect a shimmering translucent barricade around the area.
You call upon energy from the focal point and a heavy weight pervades the area, pushing down on every inch of your body.
A mote of energy from the leylines gravitates toward your hand, and as you visualize your enemies, it seems to draw purpose from your ire before dispersing into a cluster that zips off.
Focusing intently, you bid a protective barrier to cloak your allies, power from the leylines facilitating the feat.
You cease to erect the fortification.
You can only erect a fortification at a focal point.
Steeling yourself, you step forward and drop to one knee, bidding the energies to you. As it resists your unfamiliar pull, you feel it tug at the very fiber of your being, threatening to unravel it.

As the strange gravitational pull drawing the tendrils toward you wins over, the tether of energy realigns itself with a violent snap and defining crack. You begin to manipulate it delicately and attune the extraction to your glorious city.
You maintain focus on manipulating the delicate energies to attune them to your glorious city.
You find yourself unable to continue your attempt to wrest control of the focal point.
There is no focal point here to exert control over.
You slowly pull back
^You slowly pull back .*\, readying yourself for a devastating strike\.$
You deal
^You deal \w+\'s .+ a mighty blow\.$
You cease concentrating on shattering your opponent's limbs.
Your target is no longer here to be attacked.
You begin to channel the music of the spheres. So much knowledge and power at once is exhilarating, but you feel that should you release your grasp on it, your physical form will surely suffer.
Your body begins to sway as the incomprehensible melody of the firmament begins to overwhelm your senses.
Finally, your heart stops racing as your soul cries in harmony with the heavens themselves.
The music of the spheres fades, leaving you weak and unsteady.
You tilt your head back and deeply inhale any scents from the air.
You bid your guardian to seek out life presences nearby.

cdb.chars[cap].last_location = cap2 cdb.chars[cap].in_area = true

Trigger.name: quick who
Trigger.script:
local str = selectString("There are", 1) if isAnsiFgColor(0) then return end if multimatches[1][1]:match("-") then return end
local dl = not cdb.scanning if not multimatches[1][1]:match("There are") then for name in string.gmatch(multimatches[1][1], "%a+") do if not name:match("^and$") then if cdb.chars[name] then cdb.add(name, true, dl) else cdb.add(name, false, dl) end end end end

Trigger.name: grab data
Trigger.script:
deleteLine()
if not tmp.who_header then display_header("Beta Who List:") tmp.who_header = true end
if not matches[2] then return end
local cap = matches[2]
cdb.temphidden = cdb.temphidden or {} if not table.contains(cdb.temphidden, cap) then table.insert(cdb.temphidden, cap) end
local dl = not cdb.scanning if cdb.chars[cap] then cdb.add(cap, true, dl) else cdb.add(cap, false, dl) end

regexCodeList.string: None.

Trigger.name: grab location
Trigger.script:
deleteLine() if not matches[2] then return end
if not tmp.who_header then display_header("Beta Who List:") tmp.who_header = true end
local cap = matches[2] local cap2 = matches[3]
cdb.temphidden = cdb.temphidden or {}
local dl = not cdb.scanning if cdb.chars[cap] then cdb.add(cap, true, dl) else cdb.add(cap, false, dl) end
cdb.tempwho = cdb.tempwho or {}
if cdb.tempwho[cap2] and not table.contains(cdb.tempwho[cap2], cap) then cdb.tempwho[cap2][#cdb.tempwho[cap2] + 1] = cap else cdb.tempwho[cap2] = { cap } end
cdb.tempwholist = cdb.tempwholist or {} cdb.temploc = cdb.temploc or {} table.insert(cdb.tempwholist, cap)
local check = {} for i, v in ipairs(cdb.tempwholist) do local loc = v if check[v] and cap == v then cdb.tempwholist[i] = v .. "_" .. check[v] + 1 loc = v .. "_" .. check[v] + 1 end if not cdb.temploc[loc] then cdb.temploc[loc] = cap2 end check[v] = check[v] and tonumber(check[v] + 1) or 1 end

Trigger.name: stop cap
Trigger.script:
selectCurrentLine() deleteLine() setTriggerStayOpen("who", 0) tmp.who_header = nil echo("\n")
local whogroups = {} for k, v in pairs(cdb.tempwho) do if #v > 1 then whogroups[k] = v end end
local alone = {} for k, v in pairs(cdb.tempwho) do for _, c in ipairs(cdb.tempwholist) do if not table.contains(whogroups, c) and not table.contains(alone, c) then table.insert(alone, c) end end end
if alone ~= {} then local str local str_two local displayed = {} local tot = #alone local tot = math.ceil(tot - (#alone/2)) for i, v in ipairs(alone) do if not displayed[v] then str = alone[i] .. ":" .. string.rep(" ", 15 - alone[i]:len()) .. cdb.temploc[alone[i]] str = str .. string.rep(" ", 41 - str:len()) .. "(" displayed[alone[i]] = true if alone[i+tot] then str_two = string.rep(" ", 50 - (str:len() + mmp.ret_len_nums(cdb.temploc[alone[i]]))) .. alone[i+tot] .. ":" .. string.rep(" ", 15 - alone[i+tot]:len()) .. cdb.temploc[alone[i+tot]] str_two = str_two .. string.rep(" ", 54 - (str_two:len() + mmp.ret_len_nums(cdb.temploc[alone[i]]))) .. "(" displayed[alone[i+tot]] = true else str_two = "\n" end echo(str) mmp.echonums(cdb.temploc[alone[i]], true) echo(")") echo(str_two) if alone[i+tot] then mmp.echonums(cdb.temploc[alone[i+tot]], true) echo(")\n") end end end end
if #cdb.temphidden > 0 then whogroups["hidden from who"] = cdb.temphidden end
local locgroups = {} local count = 0 for k, v in pairs(whogroups) do count = count + 1 table.insert(locgroups, k) end
local tot = math.ceil(count - (count/2))
local str local str_two local displayed = {} for i, v in ipairs(locgroups) do if not displayed[v] then str = locgroups[i] .. ":" str = str .. string.rep(" ", 41 - str:len()) displayed[locgroups[i]] = true if locgroups[i+tot] then str_two = string.rep(" ", 50 - str:len()) .. locgroups[i+tot] .. ":" displayed[locgroups[i+tot]] = true else str_two = "" end echo("\n") cecho("<spring_green>" .. str) cecho("<spring_green>" .. str_two .. "\n") local group = whogroups[locgroups[i]] local count = #group local names if count == 1 then names = table.concat(group) else names = table.concat(group, ", ", 1, (count - 1)) end if count > 1 then names = names .. " and " .. group[count] .. "." end str = names if whogroups[locgroups[i+tot]] then local group = whogroups[locgroups[i+tot]] local count = #group local names if count == 1 then names = table.concat(group) else names = table.concat(group, ", ", 1, (count - 1)) end if count > 1 then names = names .. " and " .. group[count] .. "." end str = str .. string.rep(" ", 50 - str:len()) .. names end echo(str .. "\n") end end
display_footer()
cdb.tempwho = {} cdb.tempwholist = {} cdb.temploc = {} cdb.temphidden = {}

Trigger.name: right venom
Trigger.script:
local tar = tmp.target:title() local t = cdb.chars[tar]
if tmp.rebounded then tmp.rebounded = false return end if tmp.blockvenom then tmp.blockvenom = false return end
local side = "right"
if tonumber(multimatches[2][2]) == 1.99 then side = "left" end
venom = inv.weap.venoms[side][1]
ks.to_aff(tar, venom) table.remove(inv.weap.venoms[side], 1)

Trigger.name: venom
Trigger.script:
local tar = tmp.target:title() local t = cdb.chars[tar]
if tmp.rebounded then tmp.rebounded = false return end if tmp.blockvenom then tmp.blockvenom = false return end
if t.defs.immunity then cdb.def(tar, "immunity") return end
local side = inv.side() local venom = inv.weap.venoms[side][1]
if ks.to_aff then ks.to_aff(tar, venom) else local vn_stacked = { ["right_leg_broken"] = "left_leg_broken", ["left_arm_broken"] = "right_arm_broken" } local aff = ks.lib[venom]
if vn_stacked[aff] and t.affs[aff] then cdb.aff(vn_stacked[aff]) elseif ks.lib[aff].def then cdb.def(name, aff) else cdb.aff(name, aff, true) end end table.remove(inv.weap.venoms[side], 1)

Trigger.name: fitness
Trigger.script:
local str = selectString("Fitness", 1) if isAnsiFgColor(0) then return end
local tar = multimatches[2][2]:title() local t = cdb.chars[tar] local aff = "asthma"
if not (t.affs.asthma or t.affs.limp_veins) then cdb.def(tar, "fitness", true) return end
if t.affs.limp_veins then aff = "limp_veins" end
if tar == tmp.target:title() then stopwatch.t_fit = nil stopwatch.t_fit = createStopWatch() startStopWatch(stopwatch.t_fit) fs.on("t_fit", .9) end
tmp.t_fit = tmp.t_fit or {} table.insert(tmp.t_fit, 1, tar)
timers.t_fit = timers.t_fit or {} if timers.t_fit[tar] then killTimer(timers.t_fit[tar]) end timers.t_fit[tar] = tempTimer(.9, [[cdb.aff(tmp.t_fit[1], "asthma", nil) cdb.aff(tmp.t_fit[1], "limp_veins", nil) table.remove(tmp.t_fit, 1) stopwatch.t_fit = nil]])

regexCodeList.string: uses Fitness.
^(\w+) uses Fitness\.$

Trigger.name: herb

cdb.aff(tar, "anorexia") cdb.aff(tar, "indifference") cdb.aff(tar, "asleep") cdb.aff(tar, "unconscious")
if timers.shadow_used then local to_sb = tonumber(timers.shadow_used - getStopWatchTime(stopwatch.shadow)) local delay = 1.1 - to_sb if delay > 0 then fs.on("sleight", delay) end else fs.on("sleight", 1.1) end
if cure == "hawthorn" then if t.affs.ruptured_eardrum then cdb.aff(tar, "ruptured_eardrum") return else cdb.def(tar, "deafness", true) return end elseif cure == "bayberry" then cdb.def(tar, "blindness", true) return end
cdb.sort_cure(tar, cure)

Trigger.name: pipe
Trigger.script:
local tar = multimatches[2][2]:title() local cure = multimatches[2][3] local t = cdb.chars[tar]
cdb.aff(tar, "asthma") cdb.aff(tar, "asleep") cdb.aff(tar, "unconscious")
if cure == "skullcap" then if t.defs.rebounding then return end
tmp.rebounding = tmp.rebounding or {} table.insert(tmp.rebounding, 1, tar)
timers.t_rebounding = timers.t_rebounding or {} if timers.t_rebounding[tar] then killTimer(timers.t_rebounding[tar]) end timers.t_rebounding[tar] = tempTimer(6, [[cdb.def(tmp.rebounding[1], "rebounding", true) table.remove(tmp.rebounding, 1) send(" ")]]) end
if not affs.lib[cure] then return end
for i, v in ipairs(affs.lib[cure]) do if t.affs[v] and not affs.blocked(aff) then cdb.aff(tar, v) break end end

regexCodeList.string: takes a long drag off

Trigger.name: poultice
Trigger.script:
local tar = multimatches[2][2]:title() local cure = multimatches[2][3] local limb = multimatches[2][4]:gsub(" ", "_") local t = cdb.chars[tar]
cdb.aff(tar, "slickness") cdb.aff(tar, "asleep") cdb.aff(tar, "unconscious")
if cure == "jecis" then if t.affs.crushed_chest and limb == "torso" then cdb.aff(tar, "crushed_chest") return end cdb.chars[tar].restoring = multimatches[2][4] local tar = tar:lower() tmp.restored = tmp.restored or {} tmp.restored.names = tmp.restored.names or {} tmp.restored.limbs = tmp.restored.limbs or {}
table.iremovekey(tmp.restored.names, tar) table.removekey(tmp.restored.limbs, tar) table.insert(tmp.restored.names, 1, tar) tmp.restored.limbs[tar] = limb
timers.restore = timers.restore or {} if timers.restore[tar] then killTimer(timers.restore[tar]) end
timers.restore[tar] = tempTimer(3.7, [[ cdb.sort_cure(tmp.restored.names[1], "restoration", tmp.restored.limbs[tmp.restored.names[1]:lower()]) cdb.limb(tmp.restored.names[1], tmp.restored.limbs[tmp.restored.names[1]:lower()], "33.33", true) cdb.chars[tmp.restored.names[1]:title()].restoring = "none" table.remove(tmp.restored.names, 1) tmp.restored.names[1] = nil]]) elseif cure == "fumeae" and not t.affs.shivering and not t.affs.frozen then cdb.def(tar, "insulation", true) else cdb.sort_cure(tar, cure, limb) end

Trigger.name: restore
Trigger.script:
local tar = multimatches[2][2]:title() local t = cdb.chars[tar]
local function blocked(aff) if not aff then return false end if not affs.lib[aff] then return false end if not affs.lib[aff].block then return false end
for i, v in ipairs(affs.lib[aff].block) do if t.affs[v] then return true end end
return false end
for i, v in ipairs({ "right_leg_broken", "left_leg_broken", "right_arm_broken", "left_arm_broken" }) do if t.affs[v] and not blocked(aff) then cdb.aff(tar, v) end end

Trigger.name: salve
Trigger.script:
local tar = multimatches[2][2]:title() local cure = multimatches[2][3] local limb = multimatches[2][4]:gsub(" ", "_") local t = cdb.chars[tar]
cdb.aff(tar, "slickness", nil) cdb.aff(tar, "asleep", nil) cdb.aff(tar, "unconscious", nil)
if cure == "restoration" then if t.affs.crushed_chest and limb == "torso" then cdb.aff(tar, "crushed_chest") return end cdb.chars[tar].restoring = multimatches[2][4] local tar = tar:lower() tmp.restored = tmp.restored or {} tmp.restored.names = tmp.restored.names or {} tmp.restored.limbs = tmp.restored.limbs or {}
table.iremovekey(tmp.restored.names, tar) table.removekey(tmp.restored.limbs, tar) table.insert(tmp.restored.names, 1, tar) tmp.restored.limbs[tar] = limb
timers.restore = timers.restore or {} if timers.restore[tar] then killTimer(timers.restore[tar]) end
timers.restore[tar] = tempTimer(3.7, [[ cdb.sort_cure(tmp.restored.names[1], "restoration", tmp.restored.limbs[tmp.restored.names[1]:lower()]) cdb.limb(tmp.restored.names[1], tmp.restored.limbs[tmp.restored.names[1]:lower()], "33.33", true) cdb.chars[tmp.restored.names[1]:title()].restoring = "none" table.remove(tmp.restored.names, 1) tmp.restored.names[1] = nil]]) elseif cure == "caloric" and not t.affs.shivering and not t.affs.frozen then cdb.def(tar, "insulation", true) else cdb.sort_cure(tar, cure, limb) end

Trigger.name: deftable firstline
Trigger.script:
local str = selectString(matches[1], 1) if isAnsiFgColor(0) then return end
defs.active = {}
for k, v in pairs(defs.trait) do defs.add(k, false, false) end
if not gmcp or not gmcp.Char then return end
echo("\n") if tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.blind) == 1 then defs.add("blindness", true, true, false) end if tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.deaf) == 1 then defs.add("deafness", true, true) end if tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.cloak) == 1 then defs.add("cloak", true, true) end if tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.fangbarrier) == 1 then defs.add("fangbarrier", true, true) end

for i, v in ipairs(howls) do defs.rem(v, true) defs.traits(v, true) defs.nokeep(v, false) end
local to_def = { ["Angry"] = "howl_hatred", ["Baleful"] = "howl_sensitivity", ["Berserking"] = "howl_berserking", ["Befuddling"] = "howl_confusion", ["Comforting"] = "howl_mana", ["Confining"] = "howl_claustrophobia", ["Debilitating"] = "howl_weariness", ["Deep"] = "howl_plodding", ["Deranged"] = "howl_hallucinations", ["Dumbing"] = "howl_idiocy", ["Disruptive"] = "howl_portalbane", ["Distasteful"] = "howl_anorexia", ["Disturbing"] = "howl_disrupted", ["Enfeebling"] = "howl_enfeebling", ["Fearful"] = "howl_fear", ["Forceful"] = "howl_prone", ["Hypnotic"] = "howl_hypersomnia", ["Invigorating"] = "howl_endurance", ["Lethargic"] = "howl_lethargy", ["Lulling"] = "howl_asleep", ["Mind_numbing"] = "howl_stupidity", ["Mourning"] = "howl_blurry_vision", ["Muddling"] = "howl_magic_impaired", ["Paralyzing"] = "howl_paresis", ["Piercing"] = "howl_no_deaf", ["Rejuvenating"] = "howl_willpower", ["Roaring"] = "howl_health_drain", ["Rousing"] = "howl_recklessness", ["Screeching"] = "howl_mana_drain", ["Serenading"] = "howl_serenading", ["Soothing"] = "howl_health", ["Stomach_churning"] = "howl_vomiting", ["Traumatic"] = "howl_amnesia", }
local howl_one = multimatches[2][2]:gsub("-", "_"):title() local howl_two = multimatches[2][3]:gsub("-", "_"):title() local howl_three = multimatches[2][4]:gsub("-", "_"):title()
defs.add(to_def[howl_one], true, false) defs.traits(to_def[howl_one]) defs.keep(to_def[howl_one])

regexCodeList.string: ^\d+\s+.*\s+(a skullcap flow|a valerian leaf|antispasma|demulcent|slippery elm|sudorific|empty)\s+\d+\s+((\d+)|artifact)\s+(yes|no)$

Trigger.name: pipelist footer
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("pipelist header", 0)
local function pop_pipes() local empty = inv.pipelist.empty if empty == 0 then return end if empty > 3 then empty = 3 end
local elm = inv.pipelist.elm local valerian = inv.pipelist.valerian local skullcap = inv.pipelist.skullcap local fill = "elm" local fill2 = "valerian" local fill3 = "skullcap"
if elm <= valerian and elm <= skullcap then fill = "elm" elm = elm + 1 elseif valerian <= skullcap then fill = "valerian" valerian = valerian + 1 else fill = "skullcap" skullcap = skullcap + 1 end
if elm <= valerian and elm <= skullcap then fill2 = "elm" elm = elm + 1 elseif valerian <= skullcap then fill2 = "valerian" valerian = valerian + 1 else fill2 = "skullcap" skullcap = skullcap + 1 end
if elm <= valerian and elm <= skullcap then fill3 = "elm" elm = elm + 1 elseif valerian <= skullcap then fill3 = "valerian" valerian = valerian + 1 else fill3 = "skullcap" skullcap = skullcap + 1 end
e.echo("Refilling: " .. fill .. ", " .. fill2 .. ", then " .. fill3 .. ".", true, false)
if empty == 1 then inv.pipe_empty(fill) elseif empty == 2 then inv.pipe_empty(fill) inv.pipe_empty(fill2) elseif empty == 3 then inv.pipe_empty(fill) inv.pipe_empty(fill2) inv.pipe_empty(fill3) end
inv.pipelist.empty = inv.pipelist.empty - empty
if inv.pipelist.empty > 0 then pop_pipes() end end
pop_pipes()

Trigger.name: snap
Trigger.script:
local cap = multimatches[2][2] if cap == "a cloaked figure" then cap = nil end if cap and cap ~= tmp.target:title() then return end local tar = cap:title() or tmp.target:title() local t = cdb.chars[tar]
if not t.traits.sealed then return end
tmp.snapped = tar:lower()
if timers.t_snapped then killTimer(timers.t_snapped) end timers.t_snapped = tempTimer(5, [[cdb.chars[tmp.snapped:title()].traits.snapped = nil cdb.chars[tmp.snapped:title()].traits.sealed = nil cdb.chars[tmp.snapped:title()].traits.hypnotised = nil]])
if cap then cdb.trait(cap, "snapped", true) cdb.trait(cap, "sealed") cdb.trait(cap, "hypnotised") --table.insert(tmp.snapped, 1, cap) else cdb.trait(tmp.target, "snapped", true) cdb.trait(tmp.target, "sealed") cdb.trait(tmp.target, "hypnotised") --table.insert(tmp.snapped, 1, tmp.target) end
--local time = #tmp.suggested * 3.5 --tempTimer(time, [[cdb.trait(tmp.snapped[1], "snapped") --table.remove(tmp.snapped, 1)]])

Trigger.name: Alertness (Achaea+Imperian)
Trigger.script:
mmp.alertness = mmp.alertness or {}
local alertness = mmp.alertness
local roomexists, getRoomName, anytolong, matches, deleteLine = mmp.roomexists, getRoomName, mmp.anytolong, matches, deleteLine
if mmp.debug then mmp.alertnessTime = mmp.alertnessTime or createStopWatch() startStopWatch(mmp.alertnessTime) end
for k, v in pairs (gmcp.Room.Info.exits) do local longexitname = mmp.anytolong(k) if roomexists(v) and matches[3]:lower() == getRoomName(v):lower() and longexitname then alertness[longexitname] = alertness[longexitname] or {} alertness[longexitname][#alertness[longexitname]+1] = matches[2] --deleteLine()
end end
local currentroomname = mmp.cleanroomname(mmp.currentroomname)
if matches[3] == currentroomname then alertness.here = alertness.here or {} alertness.here[#alertness.here+1] = matches[2] --deleteLine() end
mmp.pdb[matches[2]] = matches[3] mmp.pdb_lastupdate[matches[2]] = true
enableTrigger"Mudlet Mapper prompt trigger"
if mmp.debug then mmp.echo("alertness trigger for "..matches[2].." took "..stopStopWatch(mmp.alertnessTime).."s.") end

Trigger.name: Mudlet Mapper prompt trigger
Trigger.script:
if mmp.alertness and next(mmp.alertness) then
local dirs = {} for direction, _ in pairs(mmp.alertness) do dirs[#dirs+1] = direction end local people = select(2, next(mmp.alertness)) or {}
moveCursor(0, getLineNumber())
if ndb then local getcolor = ndb.getcolor for i = 1, #people do people[i] = getcolor(people[i])..people[i] end end
e.echo(table.concat(dirs, ', ') .. " <red>-"..(#dirs > 1 and ("\n ") or '').." <white>" .. ((tmp and concand) and concand(people) or table.concat(people, ', ')) .. "<cyan> ("..#people..")\n") --cinsertText moveCursorEnd()
mmp.alertness = nil
raiseEvent("mmapper updated pdb") end
-- reset names we last seen, so scripts can be efficient -- not finished yet --if next(mmp.pdb_lastupdate) then -- mmp.pdb_lastupdate = {} --end
disableTrigger"Mudlet Mapper prompt trigger"

Alias.name: dodging
parrying
Alias.script:
fs.release()
local alias = matches[2]
defs.preserve.parrying = true tmp.parry = true
local function clear_modes() for _, m in ipairs({ "manual", "random" }) do defs.parry[m] = false end end
local function set_manual() if defs.parry.manual then return end
clear_modes() defs.parry.manual = true
e.warn("Manual parrying engaged. May the Force be with you.", false, true) end
local function set_mode(mode) clear_modes() defs.parry[mode] = true
e.warn("\'" .. mode:title() .. "\' parrying engaged.", false, true) end
if alias == "ph" then defs.parry.limb = "head" e.warn("Parrying head.", false, true) set_manual() elseif alias == "pt" then defs.parry.limb = "torso" e.warn("Parrying torso.", false, true) set_manual() elseif alias == "pll" then defs.parry.limb = "left leg" e.warn("Parrying left leg.", false, true) set_manual() elseif alias == "prl" then defs.parry.limb = "right leg" e.warn("Parrying right leg.", false, true) set_manual() elseif alias == "pla" then defs.parry.limb = "left arm" e.warn("Parrying left arm.", false, true) set_manual() elseif alias == "pra" then defs.parry.limb = "right arm" e.warn("Parrying right arm.", false, true) set_manual() elseif alias == "prand" then set_mode("random") elseif alias == "ptr" then if not matches[3] then e.warn("Will no longer re-parry on a recursive timer.") defs.parry.timer = false if timers.parry_timer then killTimer(timers.parry_timer) end return end defs.parry.timer = matches[3] e.warn("Will now re-parry every <dark_orange>" .. defs.parry.timer .. " <navajo_white>seconds.") elseif alias == "ps" then if defs.parry.on_sync then defs.parry.on_sync = false e.warn("Will no longer re-parry when regaining sync.") else defs.parry.on_sync = true e.warn("Will now re-parry when regaining sync.") end end

"<grey>.", true, false) end else for i, v in ipairs(registered[arg]) do match.allow[v] = true e.kswitch("Will now match <gold>" .. v .. "<grey>.", true, false) end end else if not match[arg] then match.allow[arg] = true e.kswitch("Will now allow <gold>" .. arg .. "<grey>.", true, false) else match.allow[arg] = nil e.kswitch("Will no longer allow <gold>" .. arg .. "<grey>.", true, false) end end fs.release()

Alias.name: web listening
Alias.script:
local listen = matches[2]
if not listen then if tmp.web_listening and tmp.web_listening.toggle then tmp.web_listening.toggle = false e.warn("WEB LISTENING DISABLED!", false, true) if not tmp.paused then send("wt Web listening DISABLED!") end elseif not tmp.web_listening then tmp.web_listening = {} tmp.web_listening.toggle = true if not tmp.paused then send("wt Web listening ENABLED!") end e.warn("WEB LISTENING ENABLED!", false, true) end else if listen == "clear" then if tmp.web_listening then tmp.web_listening = { toggle = tmp.web_listening.toggle } e.warn("CLEARED WEB LISTENING LIST!", false, true) if not tmp.paused then send("wt No longer listening to any caller.") end else e.warn("CLEARED WEB LISTENING LIST!", false, true) if not tmp.paused then send("wt No longer listening to any caller.") end end elseif listen == "d" then if tmp.web_listening then e.echo("You are currently listening to the following callers:", false, true) for k, v in pairs(tmp.web_listening) do if k ~= "toggle" then e.info(k, false, true) end end else e.warn("Web listening hasn't been initiated yet this session. Please use 'WL' to toggle.", false, true) end elseif listen == "all" then if tmp.web_listening and not tmp.web_listening.all then tmp.web_listening.all = true e.warn("WEB LISTENING ENABLED FOR ALL CALLERS!", false, true) if not tmp.paused then send("wt Will now listen to all callers.") end if not tmp.web_listening.toggle then tmp.web_listening.toggle = true if not tmp.paused then send("wt Web listening ENABLED!") end e.warn("WEB LISTENING ENABLED!", false, true) end elseif tmp.web_listening and tmp.web_listening.all then tmp.web_listening.all = nil e.warn("WEB LISTENING DISABLED FOR ALL CALLERS!", false, true) if not tmp.paused then send("wt Will no longer listen to all callers.") end elseif not tmp.web_listening then tmp.web_listening = { toggle = true, all = true } e.warn("WEB LISTENING ENABLED FOR ALL CALLERS!", false, true) if not tmp.paused then send("wt Will now listen to all callers.") end if not tmp.paused then send("wt Web listening ENABLED!") end e.warn("WEB LISTENING ENABLED!", false, true) end elseif not tmp.web_listening then tmp.web_listening = {} tmp.web_listening.toggle = true if not tmp.paused then send("wt Web listening ENABLED!") end tmp.web_listening[listen] = true e.warn("WILL NOW LISTEN TO: <red>" .. listen:title(), false, true) if not tmp.paused then send("wt Will now listen to: " .. listen:title()) end e.warn("WEB LISTENING ENABLED!", false, true) elseif not tmp.web_listening.toggle then tmp.web_listening.toggle = true if not tmp.paused then send("wt Web listening ENABLED!") end e.warn("WEB LISTENING ENABLED!", false, true) tmp.web_listening[listen] = true e.warn("WILL NOW LISTEN TO: <red>" .. listen:title(), false, true) if not tmp.paused then send("wt Will now listen to: " .. listen:title()) end elseif tmp.web_listening[listen] then tmp.web_listening[listen] = nil e.warn("WILL NO LONGER LISTEN TO: <red>" .. listen:title(), false, true) if not tmp.paused then send("wt Will no longer listen to: " .. listen:title()) end else tmp.web_listening[listen] = true e.warn("WILL NOW LISTEN TO: <red>" .. listen:title(), false, true) if not tmp.paused then send("wt Will now listen to: " .. listen:title()) end end end

Alias.name: soul_poison
Alias.script: if not o.stats.class == "carnifex" then return end local cap = tonumber(matches[2]) if cap > 10 or cap < 0 then e.error("Please select a value between 0 and 10.", true, false) return end ks.sets.carnifex.poison_thresh = cap e.kswitch("Will now soul poison when target has <red>" .. cap .. " <grey>afflictions.", true, false)

Alias.name: judge
Alias.script:
if o.stats.class ~= "luminary" or not can.reqbaleq() then return end
if fs.judgement then return end
inv.wield("shield", "left", false) inv.wield("spiritmace", "right", false) prompt.queue(prompt.q)
send("judge " .. tmp.target) fs.on("judgement", 0.5)
channel.attempting("judgment")

Alias.name: sap
Alias.script: if not o.stats.class == "luminary" then return end local cap = tonumber(matches[2]) if cap > 100 or cap < 0 then e.error("Please select a value between 0 and 100.", true, false) return end ks.sets.luminary.sap_thresh = cap e.kswitch("Will now sap at <navajo_white>" .. cap .. "<red>% <grey>of the target's mana.", true, false)

Alias.name: overwhelm
Alias.script: if not o.stats.class == "luminary" then return end local cap = tonumber(matches[2]) if not (cap == 0 or cap == 1 or cap == 2 or cap == 5 or cap == 10) then e.error("Please select levels 0, 1, 2, or 5 or 10 as the number of afflictions to overwhelm at.", true, false) return end if cap == 1 then cap = 5 end if cap == 2 then cap = 10 end ks.sets.luminary.o_thresh = cap e.kswitch("Will now overwhelm at <red>" .. cap .. " <grey>afflictions.", true, false)

Alias.name: piety
Alias.script: send("perform rite of piety")

Alias.name: demons
Alias.script: send("perform rite of demons")

Alias.name: chasm
Alias.script:
if o.stats.class ~= "teradrim" or not can.reqbaleq() then return end
if fs.chasm then return end
wield("shield", "left", false) wield("flail", "right", false) prompt.queue(prompt.q)
send("earth chasm " .. tmp.target) fs.on("chasm", 0.5)
channel.attempting("chasm")

Alias.name: refining control
Alias.script:
if not can:reqbaleq() then return end if fs.check("control") then return end
send("refining control") fs.on("control", 0.5)
track:channel_attempt("control")

Alias.name: refining erect
Alias.script:
if not can:reqbaleq() then return end if fs.check("erect") then return end
if arg == "int" then tmp.fort = "interference" elseif arg == "damp" then tmp.fort = "dampening" elseif arg == "dis" then tmp.fort = "disruption" elseif arg == "grav" then tmp.fort = "gravity" elseif arg == "bar" then tmp.fort = "barricade" else tmp.limb = arg end
send("refining erect " .. tmp.fort) fs.on("erect", 0.5)
track:channel_attempt("erect")

Alias.name: refining shackle eld
Alias.script: send("refining shackle eld")

Alias.name: gag management
Alias.script:
local gag = tonumber(matches[2])
if gag == 0 then disableTrigger("gag_level_one") disableTrigger("gag_level_two") disableTrigger("gag_level_three") e.info("Gag set to 'none.' Will only gag superfluous lines.", false, true) elseif gag == 1 then enableTrigger("gag_level_one") disableTrigger("gag_level_two") disableTrigger("gag_level_three") e.info("Gag set to 'one.' Will gag nonimportant lines.", false, true) elseif gag == 2 then enableTrigger("gag_level_one") enableTrigger("gag_level_two") disableTrigger("gag_level_three") e.info("Gag set to 'two.' Will gag nonessential lines.", false, true) elseif gag == 3 then enableTrigger("gag_level_one") enableTrigger("gag_level_two") enableTrigger("gag_level_three") e.info("Gag set to 'three.' Will gag everything except essential lines.", false, true) end

Alias.name: reset enemy affs
Alias.script: tmp.enemyaffs={}

Alias.name: reset hypno
Alias.script: t.traits.hypnosis = false t.traits.sealed = false t.traits.snapped = false offense.suggested = {} tmp.hypno_count = 0

Alias.name: hypnosis toggles
Alias.script:
local arg = matches[2] local arg2 = matches[3]
if arg == "snap" then tmp.snap = arg2 e.echo("Will snap at " .. tmp.snap .. ".") elseif arg == "time" then tmp.sealtimer = tonumber(arg2) e.echo("Will seal with a " .. tmp.sealtimer .. " second delay.") elseif arg == "reset" then t.traits.hypnosis = false t.traits.sealed = false t.traits.snapped = false offense.suggested = {} tmp.hypno_count = 0 end

Alias.name: Go to ID or area
Alias.script:
local where = matches[2]:lower() local gallop if command:ends("gallop") then gallop = "gallop" where = where:sub(1, -8) elseif command:ends("sprint") then gallop = "sprint" where = where:sub(1, -8) elseif command:ends("dash") then gallop = "dash" where = where:sub(1, -6) elseif command:ends("runaway") then gallop = "runaway" where = where:sub(1, -9) elseif command:ends("glide") then gallop = "glide" where = where:sub(1, -7) end
if mmp.debug then mmp.gotoPerf = mmp.gotoPerf or createStopWatch() startStopWatch(mmp.gotoPerf) end
-- goto room ID if tonumber(where) then mmp.gotoRoom(where, gallop) else -- goto area local split = where:split(" ") if tonumber(split[#split]) then mmp.gotoArea(where:sub(1, -#(split[#split])-2), tonumber(split[#split]), gallop) else mmp.gotoArea(where, nil, gallop) end end
if mmp.debug then mmp.echo("goto alias took "..stopStopWatch(mmp.gotoPerf).."s to run.") end

Alias.name: View roomID or area
Alias.script:
local where = matches[2]
if not where then centerview(mmp.currentroom) elseif tonumber(where) then -- view a room ID centerview(where) else -- view an area mmp.viewArea (where) end

Alias.name: Toggle pause
Alias.script: mmp.pause(matches[2])

Alias.name: Stop walking
Alias.script: mmp.stop()

Alias.name: Option
Alias.script:
if not matches[2] then mmp.settings:showAllOptions() return end
local val = matches[4] if val == "true" or val == "yes" or val == "on" then val = true end if val == "false" or val == "no" or val == "off" then val = false end
mmp.settings:setOption(matches[3], val)

Alias.name: Display area for lock/unlock
Alias.script: mmp.doLockArea(matches[2])

Alias.name: Add a room label
Alias.script: mmp.roomLabel(matches[2])

Alias.name: View/delete area labels
Alias.script: mmp.areaLabels(matches[2])

Alias.name: Room find
Alias.script: mmp.roomFind(matches[2])

Alias.name: Room look
Alias.script: mmp.roomLook(matches[2])

Alias.name: Room list
Alias.script: mmp.echoRoomList(matches[2] or mmp.areatabler[getRoomArea(mmp.currentroom)])

Alias.name: Area list
Alias.script: mmp.echoAreaList()

Alias.name: Manually set the room coordinates
Alias.script:
-- want the current room, but we're lost if matches[2] == '' and (not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom)) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
-- want another room, but it doesn't actually exist if matches[2] ~= '' and not mmp.roomexists(matches[2]) then mmp.echo("v"..matches[2].." doesn't exist.") return end
local m = matches[3] local rid, rname = (matches[2] ~= "" and matches[2] or mmp.currentroom), (matches[2] ~= "" and getRoomName(matches[2]) or mmp.currentroomname) local x,y,z
local function set() -- small func to set things setRoomCoordinates(rid, x, y, z) mmp.echo(string.format("%s (%d) is now at %dx, %dy, %dz.\n", rname, rid, x,y,z)) centerview(rid) end
-- let's be flexible and allow several ways if giving an arg -- rc x y z x,y,z = string.match(m, "(%-?%d+) (%-?%d+) (%-?%d+)") if x then set(); return end
-- rc xx? yy? zz? x,y,z = string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)x"), string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)y"), string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)z") if x or y or z then -- merge w/ old coords if any are missing local ox, oy, oz = getRoomCoordinates(rid) x = x or ox; y = y or oy; z = z or oz set(); return end
-- rc left/west, right/east, ... local ox, oy, oz = getRoomCoordinates(rid) local has = table.contains for w in string.gmatch(m, "%a+") do if has({"west", "left", "w", "l"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"east", "right", "e", "r"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"north", "top", "n", "t"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"south", "bottom", "s", "b"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northwest", "topleft", "nw", "tl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northeast", "topright", "ne", "tr"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southeast", "bottomright", "se", "br"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southwest", "bottomleft", "sw", "bl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"up", "u"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) + 1 elseif has({"down", "d"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) - 1 end
end if x then set(); return end
mmp.echo([[Where do you want to move the room to? You can use direct coordinates or relative directions.]])

Alias.name: Add a special exit
Alias.script:
-- spe clear and spe list match on this if matches[2] == "clear" or matches[2] == "list" then return end
-- need the current room, but we're lost if not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
local otherroom = tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2])
-- need the another room, but it doesn't actually exist if not otherroom or not mmp.roomexists(otherroom) then mmp.echo(matches[2].." doesn't exist.") return end
addSpecialExit(mmp.currentroom, tonumber(otherroom), matches[3]) addSpecialExit(mmp.currentroom, tonumber(otherroom), matches[3]) mmp.echo(string.format("Added special exit with command '%s' to %s (%d).", matches[3], getRoomName(otherroom), otherroom)) centerview(mmp.currentroom)

Alias.name: Add a special exit from one remote room to another
Alias.script:
local room1, room2 = tonumber(matches[2]), tonumber(matches[3])
if not room1 or not mmp.roomexists(room1) then mmp.echo("Room #"..matches[2].." doesn't exist - create it first, or make sure you got the room ID right?") return end
if not room2 or not mmp.roomexists(room2) then mmp.echo("Room #"..matches[3].." doesn't exist - create it first, or make sure you got the room ID right?") return end
addSpecialExit(room1, room2, matches[4]) mmp.echo(string.format("Added special exit with command '%s' to from %s (%d) to %s (%d).", matches[4], getRoomName(room1), room1, getRoomName(room2), room2))

Alias.name: List special exits
Alias.script: mmp.listSpecialExits(matches[2])

Alias.name: Clear all special exits
Alias.script:
-- want the current room, but we're lost if not matches[2] and (not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom)) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
-- want another room, but it doesn't exist if matches[2] and tonumber(matches[2]) and not mmp.roomexists(matches[2]) then mmp.echo("v"..matches[2].." doesn't exist.") return end
-- or a relative one if matches[2] and not tonumber(matches[2]) and not mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2]) then mmp.echo("There is no room "..matches[2].. " of us.") return end
local rid = (not matches[2] and mmp.currentroom or (tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2])))
clearSpecialExits(rid) mmp.echo(string.format("Cleared all special exits in %s (%d).\n", getRoomName(rid), rid))

Alias.name: Create a room
Alias.script:
local m = matches[2] local rid, rname if mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then rid, rname = mmp.currentroom, mmp.currentroomname end local x,y,z
local function set(newid) -- small func to set things local rid = newid or createRoomID() addRoom(rid) setRoomCoordinates(rid, x, y, z) if mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then setRoomArea(rid, getRoomArea(mmp.currentroom)) end if mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then setRoomEnv(rid, getRoomEnv(mmp.currentroom)) end setExit(mmp.currentroom, rid, m) mmp.echo(string.format("Created new room (%d) at %dx, %dy, %dz.\n", rid, x,y,z)) centerview(mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) and mmp.currentroom or rid) if not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then mmp.currentroom = rid; mmp.currentroomname = "" end end
-- let's be flexible and allow several ways if giving an arg -- rc v# x y z newid, x,y,z = string.match(m, "v(%d+) (%-?%d+) (%-?%d+) (%-?%d+)") if x then set(newid); return end
-- rc x y z x,y,z = string.match(m, "(%-?%d+) (%-?%d+) (%-?%d+)") if x then set(); return end
if not rid then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment in order to use relative coordinates.") return end
-- rc xx? yy? zz? x,y,z = string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)x"), string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)y"), string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)z") if x or y or z then -- merge w/ old coords if any are missing local ox, oy, oz = getRoomCoordinates(rid) x = x or ox; y = y or oy; z = z or oz set(); return end
-- rc left/west, right/east, ... local ox, oy, oz = getRoomCoordinates(rid) local has = table.contains for w in string.gmatch(m, "%a+") do if has({"west", "left", "w", "l"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"east", "right", "e", "r"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"north", "top", "n", "t"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"south", "bottom", "s", "b"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northwest", "topleft", "nw", "tl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northeast", "topright", "ne", "tr"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southeast", "bottomright", "se", "br"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southwest", "bottomleft", "sw", "bl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"up", "u"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) + 1 elseif has({"down", "d"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) - 1 end
end if x then set(); return end
mmp.echo([[Where do you want to move the room to? You can use direct coordinates or relative directions.]])

Alias.name: Create a link between two rooms
Alias.script:
-- need the current room, but we're lost if not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
-- make sure the dir is valid local dir = mmp.anytolong(matches[3]) if not dir then mmp.echo(matches[3].." isn't a valid normal exit.") return end
-- if we don't give a room number, then we want to auto-locate an appropriate room nearby. local otherroom if matches[2] == "" then local w = matches[3] local ox, oy, oz, x,y,z = getRoomCoordinates(mmp.currentroom) local has = table.contains if has({"west", "left", "w", "l"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"east", "right", "e", "r"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"north", "top", "n", "t"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"south", "bottom", "s", "b"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northwest", "topleft", "nw", "tl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northeast", "topright", "ne", "tr"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southeast", "bottomright", "se", "br"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southwest", "bottomleft", "sw", "bl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"up", "u"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) + 1 elseif has({"down", "d"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) - 1 end
local carea = getRoomArea(mmp.currentroom) if not carea then mmp.echo("Don't know what area are we in.") return end
otherroom = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(carea,x,y,z)))
if not otherroom then mmp.echo("There isn't a room to the "..w.." that I see - try with an exact room id.") return end
else if not mmp.roomexists(matches[2]) then -- check that an explicit other room ID is valid mmp.echo("A room with id "..matches[2].. " doesn't exist.") return else otherroom = tonumber(matches[2]) end end
if setExit(mmp.currentroom, otherroom, matches[3]) then if not matches[4] then setExit(otherroom, mmp.currentroom, mmp.ranytolong(matches[3])) end
mmp.echo(string.format("Linked %s (%d) to %s (%d) via a %s%s exit.", (getRoomName(mmp.currentroom) ~= "" and getRoomName(mmp.currentroom) or "''"), mmp.currentroom, (getRoomName(otherroom) ~= "" and getRoomName(otherroom) or "''"), otherroom, (matches[4] and "one-way " or ''), matches[3])) else mmp.echo("Couldn't create an exit.") end centerview(mmp.currentroom)

Alias.name: Delete a room
Alias.script:
-- want the current room, but we're lost if not matches[2] and (not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom)) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
-- want another room, but it doesn't exist if matches[2] and tonumber(matches[2]) and not mmp.roomexists(matches[2]) then mmp.echo("v"..matches[2].." doesn't exist.") return end
-- or a relative one if matches[2] and not tonumber(matches[2]) and not mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2]) then mmp.echo("There is no room "..matches[2].. " of us.") return end
local rid = (not matches[2] and mmp.currentroom or (tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2])))
local n = getRoomName(rid) deleteRoom(rid) mmp.echo(string.format("Deleted the %s (%d) room.\n", (n ~= "" and n or "''"), rid)) centerview(mmp.currentroom)

Alias.name: Delete a link
Alias.script:
-- need the current room, but we're lost if not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
-- make sure the dir is valid local dir = mmp.anytolong(matches[2]) if not dir then mmp.echo(matches[2].." isn't a valid normal exit.") return end
-- gone already? if not getRoomExits(mmp.currentroom)[dir] then mmp.echo(dir.." link doesn't exist already.") end
-- locate the room on the other end, so we can unlink it from there as well if necessary local otherroom if getRoomExits(getRoomExits(mmp.currentroom)[dir])[mmp.ranytolong(dir)] then otherroom = getRoomExits(mmp.currentroom)[dir] end
if setExit(mmp.currentroom, -1, dir) then if otherroom then if setExit(otherroom, -1, mmp.ranytolong(dir)) then mmp.echo(string.format("Deleted the %s exit from %s (%d).", dir, getRoomName(mmp.currentroom), mmp.currentroom)) else mmp.echo("Couldn't delete the incoming exit.") end else mmp.echo(string.format("Deleted the one-way %s exit from %s (%d).", dir, getRoomName(mmp.currentroom), mmp.currentroom)) end else mmp.echo("Couldn't delete the outgoing exit.") end centerview(mmp.currentroom)

Alias.name: Move room to another area
Alias.script: mmp.roomArea(matches[2], matches[3])

Alias.name: Set a room character
Set room weight
Alias.script:
local weight = tonumber(matches[3]), room if matches[2] == '' then room = mmp.currentroom else room = tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2]) end
if not room or not mmp.roomexists(room) then mmp.echo("Sorry - which room do you want to set the weight on? I don't know where you are at the moment, if you want to do the current room.") return end
if not weight then mmp.echo("What weight do you want to set on #"..room.."?") end
local oldweight = getRoomWeight(room) setRoomWeight(room, weight)
if weight > oldweight then mmp.echo("Increased the room weight on #"..room.." ("..getRoomName(room)..") by "..(weight-oldweight).." to "..weight.." - making it less desirable to travel through.") elseif weight < oldweight then mmp.echo("Decreased the room weight on #"..room.." ("..getRoomName(room)..") by "..(oldweight-weight).." to "..weight.." - making it more desirable to travel through.") else mmp.echo("The room weight on #"..room.." ("..getRoomName(room)..") is already "..weight..".") end

Alias.name: Set exit weight
Alias.script:
local room = (matches[2] ~= "" and tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.currentroom)
local weight, exit = tonumber(matches[3]), matches[4]
if not roomExists(room) then mmp.echo("Room "..room.." doesn't exist. It has to before we can set weights on exits.") return end
setExitWeight(room, exit, weight)
mmp.echo(string.format("Set the weight on the %d room going %s to %s. If it's a two-way exit, please set the reverse exit as well.", room, exit, weight))

Alias.name: Add/delete doors
Alias.script:
local room = (matches[2] ~= "" and tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.currentroom)
local direction, status = matches[3], matches[4]
if not roomExists(room) then mmp.echo("Room "..room.." doesn't exist. It has to before we can make doors in it.") return end
local validdirs = {'e', 's', 'w', 'n', 'ne', 'se', 'sw', 'nw', 'in', 'out', 'up', 'down'}
if not table.contains(validdirs, direction) then mmp.echo("Can't make a door in the '"..direction.."' direction - available choices are:\n "..table.concat(validdirs, ', ')) return end
local statusnum
if status == "" or status == "open" or status == "o" then statusnum = 1 elseif status == "closed" or status == "c" then statusnum = 2 elseif status == "locked" or status == "l" then statusnum = 3 elseif status == "clear" or status == "gone" then statusnum = 0 end
if not statusnum then mmp.echo("Unrecognized option - a door can be open, closed, locked or gone.") return end
setDoor(room, direction, statusnum)
if statusnum == 0 then mmp.echo("OK, door removed.") else mmp.echo("OK, door added/adjusted.") end

Alias.name: Create an area
Alias.script:
local t = getAreaTable(); local tr = {}; for k,v in pairs(t) do tr[v] = k end local newid = table.maxn(tr) + 1
setAreaName( newid, matches[2] ) mmp.echo(string.format("Created new area %s (%d)", matches[2], newid)) centerview(mmp.currentroom) raiseEvent("mmp areas changed")

Alias.name: Delete an area
Alias.script: mmp.deleteArea(matches[2])

Alias.name: Cancel area deletion
Alias.script:
if not mmp.deletingarea then mmp.echo("I wasn't deleting any areas already.") return end
local areaname = mmp.deletingarea.areaname mmp.deletingarea = nil
mmp.echo("Stopped deleting rooms in the '"..areaname.."'. The area is partially missing its rooms now, you'll want to restart the process to finish it.")

Alias.name: Rename an area
Alias.script: mmp.renameArea(matches[2])

Alias.name: List continents
Add area to continent
Alias.script:
-- ac continent [optional area]
local continent = matches[2]:title() local area if not matches[3] then area = getRoomArea(mmp.currentroom) elseif tonumber(matches[3]) then area = tonumber(matches[3]) if getRoomAreaName(area) == -1 then area = nil end else local areas = getAreaTable()
for karea, id in pairs(areas) do if karea:lower():find(matches[3]:lower(), 1, true) then area = id break end end end
if not area then mmp.echo(matches[3].." isn't a known area. Which one do you want to set?") return end
local tmp = getRoomUserData(1, "areaContinents") local continents = {}
if tmp ~= "" then continents = yajl.to_value(tmp) end
if not continents[continent] and mmp.addingcontinent ~= continent then mmp.addingcontinent = continent mmp.echo("Continent "..continent.." isn't known so far - would you like to make a new one? Do this command again if so.") return end
mmp.addingcontinent = nil
continents[continent] = continents[continent] or {}
-- have to use this instead of contains and index_of, because those count keys as well - and we don't want that local function index_of(data, areaID) for i = 1, #data do if data[i] == areaID then return i end end
return -1 end
if index_of(continents[continent], area) ~= -1 then mmp.echo(getRoomAreaName(area).." is already known as being on the "..continent.." continent.") return else continents[continent][#continents[continent]+1] = area -- not a key, because yajl will put a ton of null's. mmp.echo("Recorded that "..getRoomAreaName(area).." is on the "..continent.." continent.")
-- remove from other areas if moving for kcontinent, data in pairs(continents) do if kcontinent ~= continent then local i = index_of(continents[kcontinent], area) if i ~= -1 then table.remove(continents[kcontinent], i) if not next(continents[kcontinent]) then continents[kcontinent] = nil end mmp.echo("De-listed "..getRoomAreaName(area).." from the "..kcontinent.." continent.") end end end end
local toserialize = yajl.to_string(continents) setRoomUserData(1, "areaContinents", toserialize)

Alias.name: Add/remove a ferry room
Alias.script:
local room = tonumber(matches[2])
-- load the ferry rooms if they haven't been already if not mmp.ferry_rooms then local tmp = getRoomUserData(1, "ferry rooms")
mmp.ferry_rooms = {} if tmp ~= "" then for _, i in ipairs(yajl.to_value(tmp)) do mmp.ferry_rooms[i] = true end end end
if matches[3] == "add" then if mmp.ferry_rooms[room] then mmp.echo("Ferry room #"..room.." is already recorded as such.") return else mmp.ferry_rooms[room] = true; mmp.echo("Added #"..room.." to be a ferry room.") end else if not mmp.ferry_rooms[room] then mmp.echo("Room #"..room.." isn't a ferry one already.") return else mmp.ferry_rooms[room] = nil; mmp.echo("Removed #"..room.." from being a ferry room.") end end
local keys = {}; for k,_ in pairs(mmp.ferry_rooms) do keys[#keys+1] = k end
setRoomUserData(1, "ferry rooms", yajl.to_string(keys))

Alias.name: Show ferry rooms
Alias.script:
if not mmp.ferry_rooms then local tmp = getRoomUserData(1, "ferry rooms")
mmp.ferry_rooms = {} if tmp ~= "" then for _, i in ipairs(yajl.to_value(tmp)) do mmp.ferry_rooms[i] = true end end end
mmp.echo("Ferry rooms available:") if not next(mmp.ferry_rooms) then mmp.echo("(none)") return end
for k, _ in pairs(mmp.ferry_rooms) do mmp.echo(string.format(" (%d) - %s\n", k, getRoomName(k))) end

Alias.name: Weight ferry exits
Alias.script:
local c = 0 local weight = 200 for area in pairs(mmp.areatabler) do local rooms = getAreaRooms(area) or {} for i = 0, #rooms do local exits = getSpecialExits(rooms[i] or 0)
if exits and next(exits) then for exit, cmd in pairs(exits) do if type(cmd) == "table" then cmd = next(cmd) end
if (cmd:lower():find("buy passage to", 1, true)) then setExitWeight(rooms[i], cmd, weight) mmp.echo("Weighted "..cmd.." going to "..rooms[i].." ("..getRoomName(rooms[i])..").") c = c + 1 end end end end end
mmp.echo(string.format("%s ferry exits weighted to %s (so we don't take them over too short distances).", c, weight))

Alias.name: Clear the map completely
Alias.script:
if not mmp.map_delete_warning then mmp.echo("Are you really, really, really sure you want to delete all of the map to go to a blank state? Do the command again if you're certain.") mmp.map_delete_warning = true return end
mmp.echo("Okay, deleting...")
tempTimer(.1, function() for name, id in pairs(getAreaTable()) do deleteArea(tonumber(id)) end
mmp.echo("Deleted everything. It's all gone.") mmp.map_delete_warning = nil centerview(1) end)

Alias.name: Delete shop stockroom exits
Alias.script:
mmp.echo("Deleting all known stockroom exits (rooms with $ and a down exit)") local c = 0
for area, areaname in pairs(mmp.areatabler) do local rooms = getAreaRooms(area) or {} for i = 0, #rooms do local char = getRoomChar(rooms[i] or 0) if char == '$' then local exits = getRoomExits(rooms[i] or 0) -- retrieve after $, more efficient
if exits.down then setExit(rooms[i], -1, 'down') mmp.echo(string.format("Deleted the stockroom exit at %s (#%d in %s)", getRoomName(rooms[i]), rooms[i], mmp.areatabler[getRoomArea(rooms[i])])) c = c + 1 end end
end end
mmp.echo(string.format("Deleted %s known stockroom exit%s.", c, (c ~= 1 and 's' or ''))) centerview(mmp.currentroom)

Alias.name: Clear continent data
Alias.script:
if not mmp.wipingcontinents then mmp.wipingcontinents = true mmp.echo("Are you sure you want to wipe all continent data? If yes, do this again.") return end mmp.wipingcontinents = nil
local toserialize = yajl.to_string{} setRoomUserData(1, "areaContinents", toserialize) mmp.echo("Wiped all continents data.")

Alias.name: Delete suffixed periods
Alias.script:
mmp.echo("Deleting removing all periods at the end of room names...") local c = 0
for area, areaname in pairs(mmp.areatabler) do local rooms = getAreaRooms(area) or {} for i = 0, #rooms do local name = getRoomName(rooms[i] or 0) if string.ends(name, ".") then name = string.sub(name, 1, (#name-1)) setRoomName(rooms[i], name) mmp.echo(string.format("Patched up room #%s - '%s'", rooms[i], name)) c = c + 1 end end end
mmp.echo(string.format("Fixed up %s room%s.", c, (c ~= 1 and 's' or '')))

Alias.name: Find single exits
Alias.script:
local c = 0
local getAreaRooms, getRoomExits, contains, echoLink, getRoomEnv, envidsr = getAreaRooms, getRoomExits, table.contains, echoLink, getRoomEnv, mmp.envidsr
for area, id in pairs(getAreaTable()) do for _, roomid in pairs(getAreaRooms(id)) do local exits = getRoomExits(roomid) for dir, otherroom in pairs(exits) do local otherexits = getRoomExits(otherroom) or {} if not contains(otherexits, roomid) then echoLink(string.format("%s -> %s is oneway (%s->%s type)\n", roomid, otherroom, (envidsr and envidsr[getRoomEnv(roomid)] or "?"), (envidsr and envidsr[getRoomEnv(otherroom)] or "?")), [[mmp.gotoRoom(]]..roomid..[[)]], "Click to go to the start room "..roomid, true) c = c + 1 end end end end
mmp.echo(string.format("Found %s oneways.%s", c, (c > 10 and " Have fun. Click on lines to go to the rooms." or "")))

Alias.name: Show char marks
Alias.script:
local c = 0 local m = {} local areas = getAreaTable() local show_area = table.size(areas) > 1 and true or false
for area, id in pairs(areas) do for _, roomid in pairs(getAreaRooms(id)) do local c = getRoomChar(roomid) if c ~= '' and c ~= ' ' then m[c] = m[c] or {} m[c][#m[c]+1] = roomid end end end
if not next(m) then mmp.echo("This map has no char marks on it. Do mc on and rcc <mark> in a room to add them!") return end
for letter, rooms in pairs(m) do table.sort(rooms) mmp.echo("Rooms with the <blue>"..letter.."<reset> character on them:") for i = 1, #rooms do if not show_area then cecho(string.format(" <sea_green>%-5s<reset> %s\n", rooms[i], getRoomName(rooms[i]))) else cecho(string.format(" <sea_green>%-5s<reset> %-35s <dim_grey>(in<reset> %s<dim_grey>)\n", rooms[i], getRoomName(rooms[i]), mmp.areatabler[getRoomArea(rooms[i])])) end end end

Alias.name: Delete all special exits across a map
Alias.script: mmp.delSpecialExits(matches[2])

Alias.name: Toggle mapping mode
Save a map
Alias.script:
local function s(loc) if not saveMap(loc) then mmp.echo("Couldn't save the map :(") else if loc ~= "" then mmp.echo("Map saved.") else mmp.echo("Saved the default map.") end end end
if not saveMap then mmp.echo("Your Mudlet can't save maps. Please upgrade it!") else if matches[2] and matches[2] == "custom" then s(invokeFileDialog(false, "Please select the folder to save the map in and hit Open").."/Mudlet map from "..os.date("%A %d, %b '%y")..".dat") elseif matches[2] then s(getMudletHomeDir().."/map/"..matches[2]) else s("") end end

Alias.name: Load a map
Alias.script:
local function s(loc) if not loadMap(loc) then mmp.echo("Couldn't save the map :(") else mmp.lockWormholes(); mmp.lockSewers(); mmp.lockPebble(); if mmp.settings.waterwalk then mmp.enableWaterWalk() else mmp.disableWaterWalk() end
if loc ~= "" then mmp.echo("Map loaded.") else mmp.echo("Loaded the default map.") end raiseEvent("mmapper updated map") end end
if not loadMap then mmp.echo("Your Mudlet can't load maps. Please upgrade it!") else if matches[2] and matches[2] == "custom" then s(invokeFileDialog(true, "Please select the map file and click Open to load it")) elseif matches[2] then s(getMudletHomeDir().."/map/"..matches[2]) else s("") end end

Alias.name: Get dirs
Alias.script: if not matches[2] and not matches[3] then mmp.echo("Where do you want to showpath to?") elseif matches[2] and not matches[3] then mmp.echoPath(mmp.currentroom, matches[2]) else mmp.echoPath(matches[2], matches[3]) end

Alias.name: Check wholist
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Parse wholist") send("who b") tempTimer(10, [[disableTrigger'Parse wholist']])

Alias.name: Add Room Mark
Alias.script:
local tmp = getRoomUserData(1, "gotoMapping") local maptable = {}
if tmp ~= "" then maptable = yajl.to_value(tmp) end
local location, markname if tonumber(matches[2]) then location = matches[2]; markname = matches[3] else location = matches[3]; markname = matches[2] end
-- can't allow mark name to ne a number - yajl then generates a giant table of null's if tonumber(markname) then mmp.echo("The mark name can't be a number.") return end
maptable[markname] = location local tmp2 = yajl.to_string(maptable)
if not mmp.roomexists(1) then addRoom(1) end
setRoomUserData(1, "gotoMapping", tmp2) mmp.echo(string.format("Room mark for '%s' set to room %s.", markname, location))

Alias.name: Remove Room Mark
Alias.script:
local tmp= getRoomUserData(1, "gotoMapping") if tmp~="" then local maptable=yajl.to_value(tmp) if not maptable[matches[2]] then mmp.echo("Don't have such a mark in the db.") return end
maptable[matches[2]]=nil local tmp2=yajl.to_string(maptable) setRoomUserData(1, "gotoMapping", tmp2) mmp.echo("Removed the "..matches[2].." mark.") else mmp.echo("We don't have any marks stored anyway.") end

Alias.name: Display Room Marks
Alias.script:
local tmp= getRoomUserData(1, "gotoMapping") if tmp~="" then local maptable = yajl.to_value(tmp) or {} local sortedkeys = {} for k in pairs(maptable) do sortedkeys[#sortedkeys+1] = k end table.sort(sortedkeys)
mmp.echo("Known marks in this map:") if next(maptable) then for i = 1, #sortedkeys do echo(string.format(" %-21s %s\n", tostring(sortedkeys[i]), tostring(maptable[sortedkeys[i]]))) end else echo(" (none)\n") end else mmp.echo("No marks are recorded in this map.") end

Alias.name: Toggle map sizes
Alias.script:
local size = matches[2]
if size == "biggest" then mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({ name = "mapper", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "97%" }) mmp.echo("Map size set to pretty damn big.")
elseif size == "small" then mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({ x = "70%", y = 0, width = "28%", height = "50%" }) mmp.echo("Map size set to comfortable.")
elseif size == "big" then local window_width, window_height = getMainWindowSize() local used_width = getMainConsoleWidth()
local available_space = window_width - used_width
if matches[3] then available_space = available_space - tonumber(matches[3]) end
mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({ x = available_space*-1, y = 0, width = available_space, height = "100%" })
mmp.echo("Set the map size to big - it'll cover all of the space on the right that game text isn't using. You'll want to call this alias again if you resize the window to update.") end

Alias.name: ^make maps$
Alias.script: local c = 0 for _, id in pairs(getAreaTable()) do tempTimer(c*.5, [[exportAreaImage(]]..id..[[)]]) c = c + 1 end mmp.echo("Done!")

Alias.name: Set debug mode
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == "on" then mmp.debug = true else mmp.debug = false end
mmp.echo("Debug & performance telemetry "..(mmp.debug and "enabled" or "disabled")..".")

Alias.name: measure getPath()

ScriptGroup.name: oasis
ScriptGroup.script:
--! Current version: Beta 5.2.2
--! Core namespace declaration. o = o or {}
--! Toggle to display debugging data in various functions. --! Set true on startup to debug load_oasis(). o.debug = o.debug or false
--! Temporary data namespace declaration. tmp = tmp or {}
--! Stand-in for library from optional module ks.lua. ks = ks or {} ks.lib = ks.lib or { --! affliction and defense library asleep = { venom = "delphinium", strip = "insomnia", stack = "instawake" }, asthma = { undead = "limp_veins", strip = "fitness" }, blindness = { def = true }, constitution = { def = true }, deafness = { def = true }, dementia = { strip = "clarity" }, disfigurement = { strip = "hierophant" }, fitness = { def = true }, hierophant = { def = true }, insomnia = { def = true }, instawake = { def = true, venom = "delphinium" }, insulation = { def = true }, limp_veins = { strip = "fitness" }, vomiting = { strip = "constitution" },
--! venoms tagged by effect ["aconite"] = "stupidity", ["colocasia"] = "magic_impaired", ["curare"] = "paresis", ["darkshade"] = "sunlight_allergy", ["delphinium"] = "asleep", ["euphorbia"] = "vomiting", ["eurypteria"] = "recklessness", ["epseth"] = "left_arm_broken", ["epteth"] = "right_leg_broken", ["gecko"] = "slickness", ["hepafarin"] = "haemophilia", ["kalmia"] = "asthma", ["larkspur"] = "dizziness", ["monkshood"] = "disfigurement", ["ouabian"] = "peace", ["oculus"] = "blindness", ["prefarar"] = "sensitivity", ["scytherus"] = "thin_blood", ["selarnia"] = "selarnia", ["slike"] = "anorexia", ["vernalius"] = "weariness", ["voyria"] = "voyria", ["xentio"] = "clumsiness" }
--! @brief Executes any string as Lua. --! @param lstr The string to be executed as Lua. function execute_lua(lstr) local f, e = loadstring("return " .. lstr)
if not f then f, e = assert(loadstring(lstr)) end
local r = f()
if r ~= nil then display(r) end end
--! System echoes. e = { echo = function (str, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end cecho(string.format("%s", "<deep_sky_blue>(<steel_blue>Oasis<deep_sky_blue>): <slate_blue>Update: <grey>") .. str:title()) if lna then echo("
") end end,
info = function (str, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end cecho(string.format("%s", "<deep_sky_blue>(<steel_blue>Oasis<deep_sky_blue>): <goldenrod>Info: <grey>") .. str:title()) if lna then echo("
") end end,
kswitch = function (str, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end cecho(string.format("%s", "<deep_sky_blue>(<steel_blue>Oasis<deep_sky_blue>): <goldenrod>Killswitch: <grey>") .. str:title()) if lna then echo("
") end end,
warn = function (str, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end cecho(string.format("%s", "<deep_sky_blue>(<steel_blue>Oasis<deep_sky_blue>): <orange_red>Warning:<navajo_white> ") .. str:title()) if lna then echo("
") end end,
error = function (str, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end cecho(string.format("%s", "<deep_sky_blue>(<steel_blue>Oasis<deep_sky_blue>): <white:red>Error:<red:black> ") .. str:title()) if lna then echo("
") end end,
debug = function (str, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end cecho(string.format("%s", "<deep_sky_blue>(<steel_blue>Oasis<deep_sky_blue>): <dark_orange>Debug: <orchid>") .. str:title()) if lna then echo("
") end end,
def = function (def, rem, deftable, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end if rem then cecho("<indian_red>Your <gold>" .. def:lower() .. "<indian_red> defense has been stripped.") else if deftable then cecho("<indian_red>You have the <gold>" .. def:lower() .. "<indian_red> defense.") else cecho("<indian_red>You have gained the <gold>" .. def:lower() .. "<indian_red> defense.") end end if lna then echo("
") end end,
aff = function (aff, rem, diag, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end if rem then cecho("<green>You have cured <light_sea_green>" .. aff:lower() .. "<green>.") else if diag then cecho("<green>" .. aff:lower() .. "<light_sea_green>.") else cecho("<light_sea_green>You are afflicted with <green>" .. aff:lower() .. "<light_sea_green>.") end end if lna then echo("
") end end,
limb = function (l, res, num, wounds, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end if res then cecho("<turquoise>Your <light_slate_blue>" .. l:lower() .. " <turquoise>has recovered <light_slate_blue>" .. num .. "% <turquoise>damage.") else if wounds then local ind = 12 - l:len() cecho("<light_slate_blue>" .. l:title() .. ":" .. string.rep(" ", ind) .. "<turquoise>" .. num .. "%") else cecho("<light_slate_blue>Your <turquoise>" .. l:lower() .. " <light_slate_blue>has taken <turquoise>" .. num .. "% <light_slate_blue>damage.") end end if lna then echo("
") end end,
t_def = function (name, def, rem, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end if rem then cecho("<gold>" .. name:title() .. "<cyan>'s <gold>" .. def:lower() .. " <cyan>defense has been stripped.") else cecho("<cyan>" .. name:title() .. " <gold>has gained the <cyan>" .. def:lower() .. " <gold>defense.") end if lna then echo("
") end end,
t_aff = function (name, aff, rem, list, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end if rem then cecho("<MediumOrchid>" .. name:title() .. " <deep_pink>has cured <MediumOrchid>" .. aff:lower() .. "<deep_pink>.") else if list then cecho("<reset>" .. aff:lower() .. ", ") else cecho("<deep_pink>" .. name:title() .. " <MediumOrchid>is afflicted with <deep_pink>" .. aff:lower() .. "<MediumOrchid>.") end end if lna then echo("
") end end,
t_trait = function (name, key, switch, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end if switch then cecho("<goldenrod>" .. name:title() .. " <navajo_white>is now <goldenrod>" .. key.. "<navajo_white>.") else cecho("<navajo_white>" .. name:title() .. " <goldenrod>is no longer <navajo_white>" .. key.. "<goldenrod>.") end if lna then echo("
") end end,
t_limb = function (name, limb, dam, res, set, lnb, lna) if lnb then echo("
") end if set then cecho("<orange>" .. name:title() .. "<orange_red>'s <orange>" .. limb:gsub("_", " ") .. " <orange_red>is at <orange>" .. tostring(dam) .. "<orange_red>% damage.") elseif res then cecho("<orange>" .. name:title() .. "<orange_red>'s <orange>" .. limb:gsub("_", " ") .. " <orange_red>has restored <orange>" .. tostring(dam) .. "<orange_red>% damage.") else cecho("<orange_red>" .. name:title() .. "<orange>'s <orange_red>" .. limb:gsub("_", " ") .. " <orange>has taken <orange_red>" .. tostring(dam) .. "<orange>% damage.") end if lna then echo("
") end end,
cont = function () cecho("<deep_sky_blue>: ") echoLink("Contact Us", [[openUrl("http://oasis.interimreality.com/contact/")]], "Click to open Oasis' web portal.") end }

Script.script: function prompt_hook() _gmcp.check() _gmcp.get_stats() _gmcp.get_vitals() if ui.config.status_bar == "prompt" then ui.update_status_bar() end end

populate_skill_tree
items_events
rift_handler
pre_handler
ping_check
comms_capture
moved_room
Script.script: function moved_room() if tmp.moved_room then return end fs.release() tmp.moved_room = true end

genrun_arrived

Script.script: function util_window_toggled(_, arg) if arg == "room_items" then --ui:update_room_items() end end

Script.name: oasis_download_event
Script.script:
function oasis_download_event(_, filename) if o.debug then e.debug("Download finished for file: " .. filename, false, true) end
if cdb then cdb.parse_api_data(filename) end
local file_handlers = { ["projects.json"] = "projects_handler", ["version.json"] = "version_handler", ["manifest.txt"] = "manifest_handler", }
for fname, handler in pairs(file_handlers) do if filename:find(fname) then tmp_api_handlers[handler](filename) return end end
--if o.state then return end --! toggled "true" when on_oasis_download_finished() completes successfully if not tmp_api_data.files_ip then return end
local name_ = filename:match("[/\\]([%w%d%.%_]+)$") if tmp_api_data.files_ip[name_] then tmp_api_data.files_ip[name_] = nil if table.size(tmp_api_data.files_ip) == 0 then on_oasis_download_finished() end end end

Script.name: init_oasis
Script.script:
function init_oasis() local s = string.sub(getMudletHomeDir(), 1, 1) == "/" and "/" or "\\" local oasis_dir = getMudletHomeDir() .. s .. "oasis" .. s
if lfs.attributes(oasis_dir .. "src") and lfs.attributes(oasis_dir .. "src" .. s .. "oasis.lua") then load_oasis() else install_oasis() end end

Script.name: install_oasis
Script.script:
function install_oasis() local s = string.sub(getMudletHomeDir(), 1, 1) == "/" and "/" or "\\" local oasis_dir = getMudletHomeDir() .. s .. "oasis" local data_dir = oasis_dir .. s .. "data"
e.info("First installation detected. Please wait. Creating directory structure.", false, true)
if not lfs.attributes(oasis_dir) then assert(lfs.mkdir(oasis_dir)) end
for _, dir in ipairs({ "src", "usr", "data", "logs", "cdb", "tmp" }) do if not lfs.attributes(oasis_dir .. s.. dir) then assert(lfs.mkdir(oasis_dir .. s .. dir)) end end
e.info("Directory structure complete. Creating data files.")
local data_dir = oasis_dir .. s .. "data" .. s
for _, fname in ipairs({ "curesets", "defsets", "permanent", "chardb" }) do local fh = io.open(data_dir .. s .. fname .. ".lua", "w+") fh:write("") fh:flush() fh:close() end
if lfs.attributes(oasis_dir .. s .. "src") then e.echo("Initialisation complete! Downloading core system components...", false, true) download_oasis() else e.error("An error has occurred during system initialisation. Please contact support.", false, true) return end end

Script.name: download_oasis
Script.script:
oasis_api_config = { host = "http://oasis.interimreality.com/", api_dir = "api/v1/", project_name = "oasis", module_name = "oasys", -- Because Mudlet is coded by monkeys on typewriters. No Shakespeare, here! }
tmp_api_handlers = tmp_api_handlers or {}
tmp_api_data = tmp_api_data or {}
function download_oasis() e.info("Grabbing the latest version of the Oasis system. This may take a few moments.", false, true) get_projects() end
function oasis_api_uri() return oasis_api_config.host .. oasis_api_config.api_dir end
function get_projects() e.info("Downloading projects data from API.", false, true) local s = string.sub(getMudletHomeDir(), 1, 1) == "/" and "/" or "\\" local projects_uri = oasis_api_uri() .. "petrichor/projects" downloadFile(getMudletHomeDir() .. s .. "oasis" .. s .. "tmp" .. s .. "projects.json", projects_uri) end
function on_received_project_id(id) local s = string.sub(getMudletHomeDir(), 1, 1) == "/" and "/" or "\\" id = tonumber(id) local version_uri = oasis_api_uri() .. "petrichor/project/" .. id .. "/version" downloadFile(getMudletHomeDir() .. s .. "oasis" .. s .. "tmp" .. s .. "version.json", version_uri) end
function on_received_version_data(data) local s = string.sub(getMudletHomeDir(), 1, 1) == "/" and "/" or "\\" local rel_id, rel_name, rel_version, rel_url, rel_changelog, rel_package = data.id, data.name, data.version, data.url, data.changelog, data.package e.info("Release: "..rel_name, true, true) e.info("Version: "..rel_version, false, true) e.info("Changelog: "..rel_changelog, false, true) tmp_api_data.id = rel_id tmp_api_data.package = rel_package if rel_package == "" then tmp_api_data.package = nil end tmp_api_data.version = rel_version tmp_api_data.url = rel_url tmp_api_data.name = rel_name
local manifest_uri = oasis_api_config.host .. rel_url:sub(2) .. "manifest.txt" e.info("Downloading manifest.", false, true) downloadFile(getMudletHomeDir() .. s .. "oasis" .. s .. "tmp" .. s .. "manifest.txt", manifest_uri) end
function on_oasis_download_finished() e.info("All files received. Installing...", false, true)
if not tmp_api_data.package then e.warn("No package data was found in the release. A plugin might have been downloaded instead. Contact support.", false, true) return end
local s = "/" local package_name = tmp_api_data.package local path = getMudletHomeDir() .. s .. "oasis" .. s .. "src" .. s if not lfs.attributes(path .. package_name) then e.error("Package does not exist. Path: " .. path .. " - file: " .. package_name .. " - contact support at:", false, true) cecho("\n <deep_sky_blue>: ") echoLink("Contact Us", [[openUrl("http://oasis.interimreality.com/contact/")]], "Click to open Oasis' web portal.") return end uninstallPackage(oasis_api_config.module_name) installPackage(path .. package_name) e.info("Installation complete.", false, true) e.info("Resetting your Mudlet profile. Your screen may flash a bit. Please enter 'init' to load Oasis modules.", false, true) resetProfile() end
